ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: The event name for which the data was collected
In the past 12 months, have you felt discriminated against: because of your race, ethnicity, or color?  Definition of  ethnicity: groups of people who have the same customs, or origin
Notes: 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 777 = Don't know; 999 = Refused to answer

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, have you felt discriminated against: because you are (or your family is) from another country?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 777 = Don't know; 999 = Refused to answer

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, have you felt discriminated against: because someone thought you were gay, lesbian, or bisexual?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 777 = Don't know; 999 = Refused to answer

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, have you felt discriminated against: because of your weight?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 777 = Don't know; 999 = Refused to answer

ElementDescription: How often do the following people treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background? Teachers:
Notes: 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

ElementDescription: How often do the following people treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background? Other adults outside school:
Notes: 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

ElementDescription: How often do the following people treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background? Other students:
Notes: 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

ElementDescription: I feel that others behave in an unfair or negative way toward my ethnic group:
Notes: 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

ElementDescription: I feel that I am not wanted in American society:
Notes: 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

ElementDescription: I don't feel accepted by other Americans:
Notes: 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

ElementDescription: I feel that other Americans have something against me:
Notes: 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer
